Posts.Content: SunnyCoconut wrote: I know this is supposed to hurt and the onc suggested ibuprophen, but it doesn't touch the pain.  This is my first Taxol treatment (just finished 4 x AC) does anyone know how long this lasts?  What helps? heat? cold? anything?  Thanks for your input! Posts.Title: Taxol - body pain SunnyCoconut SusieMTN

Posts.Content: SunnyCoconut wrote: Hi, I was diagnosed as stage II this past December.  I'm curious becuase I did not have any Pet Scans or Bone Scans before surgery or chemo.  Now everything is finshed and I still have not had any scans.  My Onc says just CA 27,29 and regular bloodwork is all that is needed because I was only stage II with only microscopic lymph node involvement.  What do you think??
